**Example 1: 更新快照内容**



Input: 

```
tccli cfs UpdateCfsSnapshotAttribute --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --SnapshotId snapcfs-12345 \
    --SnapshotName xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "fjo8aejo-fjei-32eu-2je9-fhue83nd81",
        "SnapshotId": "snapcfs-12345"
    }
}
```
